General.Name: Thunderstruck Resources Ltd
General.Description: Thunderstruck Resources Ltd., a mining exploration company, acquires and explores for mineral properties. The company primarily explores for zinc, copper, silver, and gold deposits. Its flagship properties include the Korokayiu and Liwa projects located on the Island of Viti Levu, Fiji. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7
